Nick are part of a fraternity. Today his fraterniy is having a party and already is filling with college party-going jocks and their girlfriends. As you wait for your girlfirend, Susan, to arrive, you head for the bathroom to apply some cologne.

Trouble is...the cologne shrinks Nick to about 1/32 of an inch tall.

Restrictions:
Male and female interaction are both allowed. Just don't add heavily into the latter.
Nick is almost microscopic, so nobody can see him.
Any interaction is allowable, just don't make it too strange.
Nick and Nick alone shrinks in this story.
Don't kill Nick off so soon.

Other than that, have fun.
